column3: Les fumeurs de haschisch sont inoffensifs...
column6: Estos fumadores de hachís son inofensivos...

column2: Word is spreading that a man named Vladimir Solin has found ancient lore that he connects with his ridiculous heresy, the Stalinist faith. Through secret training, his men have become lethal killers and have managed to seize a castle in western Russia. Already many of his open opponents have died in mysterious circumstances, all tracing back to this new organization that calls itself the KGB.
The KGB Spread To The Baltic
These madmen may have more reach than we imagined...

Nobody seriously thought that the secretive society known as the KGB would last long, but they have proven far more resilient than anyone ever imagined. Now they have infiltrated a series of fortifications in the land of Lativia, claiming that Riga is a place claimed by the mythical organisation they take their name from. Regardless of the veracity of their claims, the fact remains that their power and influence has spread to the icy lands of the Baltic.

Nobody believed that us, the KGB would last long out in the open, but we have proven ourselves far more resilient than any infidel ever imagined. Now our faithful agents have infiltrated a series of fortifications in the land of Lativia, the mighty fortress of Riga being one of the many castles under the ancient organisation we, faithful to Lord Stalin are a continuation of.
The notorious KGB have expanded their influence yet again, seizing yet another castle, this time one in Eastern Germany.
We, the ever-faithful KGB have expanded our influence yet again, seizing yet another castle, this time one in Eastern Germany.
The Riders of the Great Sea

Ever since the foundation of the Muwahidunna religion in the 25th century the riders of the sahara have banded together into a great warrior band to train to defend their faith from all who would threaten it.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YMuwahidunna§! faith\n
This character is seen as one of the ghosts of the desert, riding forth from the dunes to ambush and then disappearing before help can arrive.
This character is a beacon of light for all those around him within the ancient Iranian homelands.

Being established by the legendary Guru Hargobind, sixth Guru of the Sikhs,the Akali Nihang, or 'Egoless Immortals', devote themselves to the selfless defence of the Sikh faithful. They are famed for their victories even when heavily outnumbered. However, some of their practices, such as the consumption of 'Sukha Parshaad' are frowned upon by mainstream Sikhs.
Partake of Sukha Parshaad, the 'Dry-Sweet' drink made of crushed herbs which is said to bring the mind closer to God.
Allows you to imbibe of the sacred 'dry-sweet' nectar, which can bring you closer to union with God.
Has not already partaken of the Holy Drink
As you drink the sacred herbal mixture, the world seems to fall away around you. A strange, warm feeling comes over you. You see something in the distance. You see...
A vision of the Immortal one - of God!
A vision of a terrible battle between the forces of good and evil
A vision of being married to a ravishingly beautiful spouse

Founded by Neeraj, a great holy man, the Neerajis have taken Jainism in a far more missionary and evangelical direction through the last few centuries. They send missions far and wide, helping the faithful Jina and establishing Monastic Communities to act as centers of religion.

The Evangelical Order of the Cross was originally a Lutheran order devoted to common living in service of Christ. Founded in Germany, the Order expanded to permit Protestants from many different traditions,  and has members from all over the Christian world.

Sveti Red Jugoslavista, "the Holy Order of Jugoslavism", is the monastic order that formed after the Jugoslavist faith triumphed over a crisis and possible schism. Marking another part of the unification of different holy orders and religious practices into one cohesive monastic order.

Founded by a pre-event family close to the Heavenly Ruby Chairman, the Zhao family's legacy has been preserved by the Liehuo faithful as an institute to understand and spread the word of the Chairman.

Disregarding the Meshichist-Mikraist split in favour of shared study of the Torah, Talmud, Zohar and other such texts, the Mekubalim is an organization that seeks to study esoteric and secret meanings of the Torah and the nature of the universe. The Mekubalim seek to promote deeper study of scripture and the self in order to get closer to Hashem.

The Society of Saint Ignatius, commonly known as Jesuits, were an antediluvian monastic order founded by Ignatius of Loyola long ago. Following the  post event Sevillian Schism with the Catholic Church, the organization became the principal monastic order for Sevillian priests, and they seek to continue the original Jesuit mission of evangelizing to the world.

The Ahle Quran is an organization of the greatest Quraniyya scholars and believers, dedicated to spreading the teachings of Quranism, a belief that the Quran is the one and only source of spiritual guidance without later external texts written by the corrupt clergy.
column3: Les Dominicains sont capables d'?couter les confessions de n'importe quel chr?tien. Habill?s en noir et blanc, ils m?nent la sainte inquisition en identifiant les h?r?tiques. En tant que membre de cet ordre, il est attendu de vous de ne pas rechercher l'enrichissement mat?riel, mais la v?rit?.
column4: Die Mitglieder des Dominikanerordens sind in schwarz und wei? gekleidet und lauschen den Beichten aller Christen. Ihnen obliegt die F?hrung der Heiligen Inquisition, deren Aufgabe es ist, Ketzer aufzusp?ren. Von Angeh?rigen des Ordens wird verlangt, allen materiellen G?tern abzuschw?ren und nach wahrer Erkenntnis zu streben.
column6: Los miembros de la Orden dominica pueden confesar a cualquier cristiano. Visten de blanco y negro, est?n al mando de la Santa Inquisici?n y su misi?n consiste en desenmascarar a los herejes. Sus miembros deben perseguir la verdad y no acumular bienes materiales.

column2: The followers of Saint Ondra lead an ascetic life, finding purpose in prayer and meditation.

The Order of the Eastern Jesuits, known by others as the Order of San Francisco Javier, is the remaining monastic order of Catholicism in Asia. As the general chaos of the Event created havoc on the connection between Rome and the now Katoliko and the Kirishitan, these two isolated Catholic faiths have banded together to form the Eastern Jesuits, converting heathens abroad and maintaining the peace between Katoliko and Kirishitan realms, just like the actual Jesuits before them.

The Order of the Golden Coin is a scholarly fraternity dedicated to the study of the works, words, and commandments of Alfred Nobel. Adherents devote themselves to the inner meaning of Nobel's teachings, rather than the attempt to explore and find answers in the discovery of Old World knowledge.

For centuries, those who desire to study the Novel more deeply have banded together in the ancient society known as The Inklings. Scholars, priests, and authors have developed many varied practices for the better understanding and interpretation of the sacred texts.
Based on an ancient society, they have dedicated themselves into improving their martial abilities for the sake of the MAdame.
These warriors of the Shintoist faiths gather to worship their gods through the glory of the duel and battle.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Shintoist§! faith\n
These warriors of the Mojiao faiths gather to worship their gods through the glory of the duel and battle.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Mojiao§! faith\n
These warriors of the Bungan faith gather to worship their gods through the glory of the duel and battle.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Bungan§! faith\n
These warriors of the Kaharingan faith gather to worship their gods through the glory of the duel and battle.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Kaharingan§! faith\n
Heavenly Hall of Water and Flame
These warriors of the Thuy Hoa faith gather to worship their gods through the glory of the duel and battle.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Thuy Hoa§! faith\n
This character is trained to burn from afar and masterfully retreat when the enemy gets too close.
This character fights with the zeal of a thousand spirits and hits just as hard.
This character has mastered the ability to use the rough terrain of their homeland as an easy escape route.
This character has mastered the movement and combat of the treacherous highlands of China.
This character's discipline and devotion let them coordinate their troops with ease.
This character has learned to use sea currents to move and raid at lightning speed.
These warriors of the Satsana Pi faith gather to strike out against their oppressors and reclaim their ancestral homelands.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Satsana Pi§! faith\n
This character's aggressiveness and zeal can be felt across all the troops they lead.

Before the Event, the Queen would prize her most loyal followers with the tile of Knight. Those great men would have the unmatched honor of serving her closely. Until the Queen comes back, it is this Lodge of her mightiest followers that takes the role of selecting the most valiant heroes to serve her.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Thelemic§!, §Old Thelemic§! or §Summer Queen§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Yesoteric§!\n
column4: Hat einen §YLehnsherrn§!, §YVasallen§! oder §Ybenachbarten Herrscher§!, der dem §Yesoteric§! Glauben folgt\n
column6: Tiene un §Yseñor§!, §Yvasallo§!, o §Ygobernante vecino§! que sigue la fe §Yesoteric§!\n

column2: In ancient times, the Great Khan ruled the plains from China to far Rus, the hooves of his followers destroying any enemy on their path. After the Event, the Khanist greatest warriors swore to embody his fury, and formed the lodge of the Wrath of the Khan.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YKhanist§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Ykhanist§!\n

column6: Tiene un §Yseñor§!, §Yvasallo§!, o §Ygobernante vecino§! que sigue la fe §Ykhanist§!\n

column2: In the harsh plains of the Kazakh Plains, the water of the Aral Sea is a treasure. The Ironists believe it has to be protected at all costs from further damage, and the Protectors of the Aral are the greatest chariotiers that make a oath to defend it from any that might cause harm to it.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YIronist§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Yironist§!\n

column2: The legendary hero only known as the White Wolf instructed the Vedmak	s during the Event on how to drive away the evil spirits that torment the world. However, he also left behind instructions on fighting said spirits and other enemies. The School of the White Wolf is formed by those that wish to learn to fight those elusive creatures.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YFolklorist§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Yfolklorist§!\n

column2: It is said that Shiva and his followers once hunted the dangerous Devils far and wide. The Dharmics to this day are on a war with the Rakshasa, messengers of chaos and famine, and the Rakshasa Hunters take on the mission of destroying any of the birds. To this end, they train endlessly, becoming the most lethal bowmen in the world.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Ymaunaxite§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Ymaunaxite§!\n

column2: Since the beginning of time, the greatest warriors of France and Numenor have been the Paladins. Led by such legendary figures as Asterix, Roland, Tancredi, The Three Musketeers and Don Quixote de la Mancha, the Paladins always aim to become the bravest Knights that might serve in the ranks of the God of War D'Artagnan, in hopes of proving themselves as peers of their brave predecessors through the Ages.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YNovelist§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Ynovelist§!\n

column2: The Tsarists believe that, long before the Event, the greatest army that ever existed, the White Army, fought against the trecherous Red Army in a struggle to defend the Tzar. After the Event, the Zarists formed a new White Army, to train themselves in the art of war and protect the future Tzars.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YTsarist§!, §Katerinist§! or §Petrist§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Yzarist§!\n

column2: The Warriors of Chelovecheskiye Dukhi follow the steps of the legendary fighters who faught spirits that destroyed the world in Antediluvian times, forming warrior bands that fight for the glory of the Mirrazum. As they wander the frozen tundra, they seek to return to the lost city of Pripyat, and to this end search for the mightiest warriors to cut a path for Mirrazumudrosters.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §nousthreskeia§! faith\n
column3: A un §Yseigneur lige§!, un §Yvassal§! ou un §Yseigneur voisin§! qui suit la foi §Ynousthreskeia§!\n

Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §Druidic§! faith\n

column2: As the Sky Bull killed Enkidu, the great king and first of his Brothers, Gilgamesh, went on a mission to search immortality, and ultimately came as close to his goal as any man could, but ultimately failed. The Brothers of Enkidu take the mantle of the mission of bringing immortality to humanity. As this search is dangerous and will certainly kill the unprepared, the Brothers train to reach the might of the Great King.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YMesopotamian§! faith\n

column2: The Sailors of the Eternal Sea
The Sailors of the Eternal Sea are a loose organisation of Sea Creed pirates who all share the common goal of improving themselves in their pirate endeavors.

The Sailors of Poseidon train hard and maintain an expert navy, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport  participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.
column3: Les Champions de l'Olympe s'entraînent durement et garde une bonne condition physique, non seulement pour les batailles, mais aussi pour les jeux sportifs  y participer est prestigieux, et les plus talentueux de leur communauté sont adorés par tous, roturiers comme nobles.
column4: Die Champions des Olymp trainieren hart und halten einen sportlichen Körperbau aufrecht. Dies dient nicht nur dem Zweck des Kampfes, sondern auch für Wettkämpfe, deren Teilnahme sehr prestigeträchtig ist. Die fähigsten unter ihnen werden von allen, ob bürgerlich oder Adel, gleichermaßen verehrt.
column6: Los Campeones Olímpicos entrenan duro y mantienen un físico experto, no solo con el propósito de la batalla, sino para los juegos de deporte -participar da prestigio, y los más hábiles de su comunidad son adorados por todos, plebeyos y nobles por igual.

column2: The Pirates of the Pacific are a loose organisation of Wokou pirates who all share the common goal of improving themselves in their pirate endeavors.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighbouring ruler§! who follows the §YOceanic§! faith\n

column2: This character is a tireless soldier of the Akali Nihang, well-versed in the traditional ways of warfare in the Punjab.
This character claims to bear the powers which only can only achieved by the blessing of Panoramix.
This character learnt to move rapidly in difficult terrains and catch the enemy with ambushes.
This character follows an aggressive battle tactics and even personally charge the enemy.
This character's natural habitat is Siberia and there they are at their peak combat performance.
This character is charismatic and cunning enough to effectively lead large group of his soldiers.
This character can launch enormous and terrifying charges.
This character has perfect vision and never misses [This.GetHerHis] target.
This character regularly plays a sacred ancient strategy game that is played on hexagrams.
This character specializes in capturing people to sacrifice to Madame Guillotine.
This character learnt to do breathtaking maneuvers with the rapid changes of speed and direction.

Those of the Starist faith that achieve great military success become known as Warriors of the Aurora. Protected by the light of the northern skies, those ingenious commanders are the true masters of combat in the lands of ice and snow.
This character has become experienced in the art of coastal raiding
This character has become experienced in the art of sailing, as well as managing and mantaining a ship
This character has become experienced in the art of coastal raiding
Has not been approached by devil workshipers before.
column3: N'a pas déjà été approché par le Illuminati.
column4: Wurde noch nicht von den Illuminati angesprochen.
column6: Nunca ha tenido contacto con el Illuminati.

column2: Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! lusts for the power of the occult. If so, you may offer [Root.GetHerHim] to join your Society.
column3: Tenter de savoir si [Root.Get_le_TitledFirstNameJ] convoite les puissances occultes.Si c'est le cas, vous pourriez lui proposer de rejoindre votre société.
column4: Versuche herauszufinden, ob §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! nach okkulter Macht trachtet. Falls dem so ist, könnt Ihr [Root.GetHerHim] in den Kreis der Jünger Eures Zirkels einladen.
column6: Averigua si §Y[Root.GetTitleFirstName]§! codicia el poder de las fuerzas ocultas. En caso afirmativo, puedes invitarlo/la a unirse a tu sociedad.

column2: The ultimate cause of the Event which destroyed Old Europe is shrouded in mystery. However, there is one theory that has persisted through the ages. It claims that a secret society used supernatural powers to bring down Old Europe for their own evil ends. Some say this society still exists today, and that they are looking for new members...

[brethren.GetName] pirates regularly engage in acts that many view as barbaric, but they at least follow a code of conduct... at least, most of them do. Some pirates disregard the sacred [brethren.GetName] Code and extract more than their fair share of [brethren.GetHighGodName]'s bounty using unspeakable methods. They are followers of Davy Jones - Davy Jones' Mates.
The Bookeepers of the King in Yellow
The Bookeepers of the King in Yellow

Lurking in the shadows, the Bookeepers maintain and create the book of their dark master, the King in Yellow, spreading its foul influence throughout the world. Those who have read the book are said to be marked by the Yellow Sign, and cursed with the knowledge of the King in Yellow and his followers. The only relief for those marked is to become a Bookkeeper, and spread the King's corruption further throughout the world

The Unseelie Court is said to be founded by corrupted fairies. There are many myths about it, such as its members provided materials for Frankenstein's unholy work. Some consider these just tales but others believe they still hold gatherings in the forests at midnight...
The Grand Master of the Illuminati.
The Hunters of the Great Reindeer
Established to primarily partake in the hunting rituals of the northern tribesmen it has existed for centuries to re-enact the hunt of the great Reindeer which can now be found in the sky.

The remaining Iranic religions in Iran and elsewhere have always been on the defensive both culturally and physically. After the chaos of the event, it has led to the formation of the Zourkaneh League, that aspires to train prospecting individuals in the martial arts of Zourkaneh and preserve their culture at the same time. It was later expanded to also allow those of Iranian Heritage to join regardless of their faith.
